alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 06 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1000 PM WEDNESDAY UNTIL 600 PM WEDNESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Logan, Sedgwick, Morgan, Washington, Yuma, Lincoln, Cheyenne, Kiowa and Kit Carson Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Sterling, Julesburg, Fort Morgan, Akron, Wray, Limon, Cheyenne Wells, Eads and Burlington. WHEN...1000 PM Wednesday April 06 to 600 PM Wednesday April 06 IMPACTS...Areas of blowing dust will impact the advisory area Wednesday afternoon. Dust will gradually decrease during the late afternoon hours. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
